alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Garfield and central Rio Blanco Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 541 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Meeker to 20 miles northwest of Rifle to 12 miles northwest of Parachute. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Garfield and central Rio Blanco Counties, including the following locations... Rio Blanco. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 6 and 33, and between mile markers 41 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
